scripts.wasm: cd src/rust && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && wasm-bindgen --target web --out-dir ../../public/wasm --no-typescript target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/calc_wasm.wasm
scripts.wasm:dev: cd src/rust && cargo watch -i .gitignore -i 'pkg/*' -s 'cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --target web --out-dir ../../public/wasm --no-typescript target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/calc_wasm.wasm'
